executive_summary: Tom Hayes is extremely bullish on China and Emerging Markets due to massive stimulus and undervaluation. He sees a regime change favoring small caps, value, and discretionary over the Magnificent 7 and defensives. He is also very bullish on natural gas and Comstock Resources. He expects short term volatility in October, but a year-end rally.
